content: in a flurry of last-minute holiday preparations i found myself in need of a quick gift turning to my trusty crochet skills i decided to create a cozy and stylish twisted headband with a super simple pattern and a vibrant yarn i whipped up this delightful accessory in less than an hour and now you can make it too **difficulty ** easy **finished size ** regular adult but it can be easily adjusted **materials needed ** 15 mm p hook 50 grams 27 yards/25 meters of super bulky weight yarn *** i used hobbii udon in purple rain colorway *** yarn needle for weaving in ends scissors stitch markers * optional * **us terms** used throughout **no chart/diagram available ** i hope you ll love it as much as i loved creating it ***happy crocheting *** *krisztina*
